languages.text: "Теневые кварталы... В мои дни на Футфоле я, бывало, брала оружие и бродила здесь, ожидая встречи с мутантом или бандитом".
"The Shadow Quarters... When I was last on Footfall, I used to take my weapon and wander this area, anticipating an encounter with a mutant or a bandit."
languages.original_text: "Теневые кварталы... В мои дни на Футфоле я, бывало, брала оружие и бродила здесь, ожидая встречи с мутантом или бандитом".

traits.locale_text: "The Shadow Quarters... When I was last on Footfall, I used to take my weapon and wander this area, anticipating an encounter with a mutant or a bandit."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Shadow Quarters... When I was last on Footfall, I used to take my weapon and wander this area, anticipating an encounter with a mutant or a bandit."

traits.locale_text: "The Shadow Quarters... When I was last on Footfall, I used to take my weapon and wander this area, anticipating an encounter with a mutant or a bandit."

traits.locale_text: "The Shadow Quarters... When I was last on Footfall, I used to take my weapon and wander this area, anticipating an encounter with a mutant or a bandit."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “阴影区……上次来落脚港时，我常常手持武器在这片区域徘徊，期待能撞上变种人或强盗之类的。”
languages.original_text: "The Shadow Quarters... When I was last on Footfall, I used to take my weapon and wander this area, anticipating an encounter with a mutant or a bandit."

traits.locale_text: “阴影区……上次来落脚港时，我常常手持武器在这片区域徘徊，期待能撞上变种人或强盗之类的。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Los barrios bajos... La última vez que estuve en Paso, solía empuñar mi arma y pasear por esta zona, esperando encontrarme con algún mutante o bandido».
languages.original_text: "The Shadow Quarters... When I was last on Footfall, I used to take my weapon and wander this area, anticipating an encounter with a mutant or a bandit."

traits.locale_text: «Los barrios bajos... La última vez que estuve en Paso, solía empuñar mi arma y pasear por esta zona, esperando encontrarme con algún mutante o bandido».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「影の区画…私が最後にフットフォールにいたとき、武器をもってこの地域を歩き回り、変異体や盗賊との遭遇を警戒していたものだ」
languages.original_text: "The Shadow Quarters... When I was last on Footfall, I used to take my weapon and wander this area, anticipating an encounter with a mutant or a bandit."

traits.locale_text: 「影の区画…私が最後にフットフォールにいたとき、武器をもってこの地域を歩き回り、変異体や盗賊との遭遇を警戒していたものだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: 「影の区画…私が最後にフットフォールにいたとき、武器をもってこの地域を歩き回り、変異体や盗賊との遭遇を警戒していたものだ」

languages.text: "Die Schattenquartiere ... Als ich zuletzt auf Footfall war, habe ich mir meine Waffe geschnappt, bin durch diese Gegend spaziert und habe gehofft, auf einen Mutanten oder Banditen zu treffen."
languages.original_text: "The Shadow Quarters... When I was last on Footfall, I used to take my weapon and wander this area, anticipating an encounter with a mutant or a bandit."

traits.locale_text: "Die Schattenquartiere ... Als ich zuletzt auf Footfall war, habe ich mir meine Waffe geschnappt, bin durch diese Gegend spaziert und habe gehofft, auf einen Mutanten oder Banditen zu treffen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Les Quartiers Obscurs... Quand j'étais sur Castel, il m'arrivait d'y déambuler avec mon arme dans l'espoir de tomber sur un mutant ou un bandit. »
languages.original_text: "The Shadow Quarters... When I was last on Footfall, I used to take my weapon and wander this area, anticipating an encounter with a mutant or a bandit."

traits.locale_text: « Les Quartiers Obscurs... Quand j'étais sur Castel, il m'arrivait d'y déambuler avec mon arme dans l'espoir de tomber sur un mutant ou un bandit. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Gölge Mahalli... En son Binliman'dayken silahımı alır, bu bölgede dolaşır, karşıma mutant veya haydut çıkmasını umardım."
languages.original_text: "The Shadow Quarters... When I was last on Footfall, I used to take my weapon and wander this area, anticipating an encounter with a mutant or a bandit."

traits.locale_text: "Gölge Mahali... Binliman'a son geldiğimde silahımı alır, bu bölgede dolaşır, bir mutant veya haydutla karşılaşmayı umardım."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Shadow Quarters... When I was last on Footfall, I used to take my weapon and wander this area, anticipating an encounter with a mutant or a bandit."
